attributes.action: Terminate payment of resettlement grants to MP's who misappropriated public funds through expense procedures and who lose or resign their seat or are deselected by constituency parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that MP's not re-elected are given assistance with readjustment to life after parliament!  This is potentially between 50-100% of salary less any outstanding liabilities due from them for any overpayments etc.  In light of the abuse of public funds through the expense procedures, these payments should not be made to MP's who have clearly participated in this abuse.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
